channel.title: Copy of Digg top 24 hours
channel.description: RSS feed with direct links to popular technology articles. based on superdigg pipe

item.title: [+2957] Amazing watercolour paintings by six-year-old boy
item.description: Kieron Williamson's attempts are so beautifully rendered that artists ten times his age will be filled with envy.

item.title: [+2795] Bikini completely melts away after a few seconds in water
item.description: Named the "Get Naked Bikini", it's being marketed as the ultimate form of revenge for recently dumped dudes. The bikini has upset women’s rights groups, with one campaigner, Rosmarie Zapfl, saying, “It is an absolute insult to women that this has been invented.”It sounds like Ms. Zapfl needs a gift to calm her down. May we suggest a new bikini?

item.title: [+2153] xkcd - Understocked
[+2027] I Think I Found Your Problem
item.description: I call the big one Bitey!

item.title: [+1893] Eminem destroys Mariah Carey in new song 'The Warning'
item.description: Eminem has released a new song tearing apart Mariah Carey and Nick Cannon after their latest song against him. 'Bitch, shut the fuck up before I put all them phone calls out you made to my house when you was wild n' out before Nick. When you was on my dick and gave you somethin' to smile about. How many times you fly to my house?'

item.title: [+1602] Digg Commenters To Get At Least 10,000 Times More Annoying
item.description: Digg introduces email alerts for followup comments.

item.title: [+1474] Nice Try!
[+1359] Shatner Returns to Conan to Read Sarah Palin's Tweets
item.description: William Shatner stopped by "The Tonight Show with Conan O'Brien" to, once again, perform a dramatic reading of words from Sarah Palin that he and Conan believe were meant to be heard as poetry. This time, it was her tweets.

item.title: [+1317] Unexpected Divorce Entrance [VIDEO]
item.description: Someday, when I fall out of love, I hope my divorce is this much fun.

item.title: [+1284] High School Student Suing Amazon After They Deleted Homework
item.description: Forget blaming it on the dog, thanks to Amazon students have a 21st century excuse for lost homework. When Amazon foolishly yanked 1984 from thousands of Kindles, Justin Gawronski's electronic notes for a summer assignment became useless.

item.title: [+1254] What is the first thing you think of upon seeing this image?
[+1198] What your body is thinking
item.description: Red button for extra bodily goodness

item.title: [+1076] Futurama ORIGINAL cast signs new deal with Fox

[+1021] Why Everything Sucks (Video)
item.description: Craig Ferguson's opening monologue rant from last week gives his grand theory of why everything sucks

item.title: [+991] Hillary Clinton Looks Excited to Be in Africa w/ Bill (PIC)
[+980] Best Friend, Worst Co-Op Partner
item.description: It's friendly fire for the altruistic.

item.title: [+837] Seven Deadly Wine Glasses
item.description: Kacper Hamilton has designed a series of seven wine glasses inspired by the seven deadly sins.

item.title: [+830] Who Could Say No? (PIC)
[+828] 'Alien' prequel to be directed by....Ridley Scott!
item.description: Twentieth Century Fox is resuscitating its Alien franchise. The studio has hired Jon Spaihts to write a prequel that has Ridley Scott attached to return as director.
